name: Rules For Robots
description:
Rules for Robots is a puzzle platformer made for the GMTK 2020 game jam, centered around guiding a defective robot out of a junkyard. 

In this game, your robot friend is low on battery and can only take a few actions before they run out of controls and shut down. Squeak your way to the exit without using up all your power!

Controls

Directions: WASD/ Arrow Keys

Jump: Space bar

Interact: E

Restart the level: R

Cheats: Esc
